plants.watering: Once a week, allow soil to dry
plants.description: A tropical plant with large, split leaves, commonly used as indoor decoration.

plants.watering: Every 2-3 weeks, allow soil to dry completely
plants.description: Succulent plant known for its medicinal gel used for skin care and burns.

plants.watering: One or two times per week, allow soil to dry
plants.description: Woody vine or shrub known for its vibrant, colorful bracts that surround its small, true flowers.
Perennial Herb, Found on every continent except Antarctica.

plants.watering: Every 1 to 2 weeks, when soil looks dry
plants.description: Is a shrub with fragrant, evergreen, needle-like leaves and white, pink, purple, or blue flowers.

plants.watering: Once a week or every 10 days
plants.description: Considered perennial shrubs or herbaceous perennials, depends on the species.
